# Tezos Timelock Javascript

## Dependencies

| |
|-|
| [GNU Make 4.3](https://www.gnu.org/software/make) |
| [opam](https://opam.ocaml.org) |

## Install

```shell
make setup
make build
```

## Usage

### Generate chest and chest key

```shell
./timelock.exe create-chest-and-chest-key --payload "05010000000b48454c4c4f20574f524c44" --time 3456

INPUTS
==================================
Payload: 05010000000b48454c4c4f20574f524c44
==================================
Time: 3456

OUTPUTS
==================================
Chest: 
==================================
Chest key: 
```

### Open a chest

#### From terminal

```shell
./timelock.exe open-chest --chest "" --chest-key "" --time 3456


INPUTS
==================================
Chest: 
==================================
Chest key: 

==================================
Time: 3456

OUTPUTS
==================================
Result : Correct: 05010000000b48454c4c4f20574f524c44
```

#### From Javascript

```typescript
import Timelock from '@smartpy/timelock';

(async () => {
    // Make sure the hacl wasm bindings get loaded before running any other method
    await Timelock.ensureHaclWasmLoaded();

    const time = 3456;

    const chest = "";

    const chest_key = "";

    const result = await Timelock.openChest(chest, chest_key, time);

    // result = `{"kind":"Correct","bytes":"05010000000b48454c4c4f20574f524c44"}`
})();

```
